questions: Does this landing page feature a clean and modern design? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a hero section on this landing page? Answer with yes or no.
Does the hero section showcase an image of the shampoo bottle? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a catchy headline that says 'Transform Your Hair Today'? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a call-to-action button like 'Shop Now' or 'Learn More'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the text in the generated picture clear and readable?  Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes The design elements are well-organized with a contemporary color scheme and layout.
yes There is a prominent area at the top featuring a product image alongside a slogan.
yes The hero section includes a large image of a shampoo bottle which draws attention.
yes The headline clearly states 'Transform Your Hair Today'.
yes There is a visible 'Shop Now' button present for user interaction.
yes The text throughout the image is clear and easily legible.
